snippet: Ellen Pao, the venture capitalist who sued Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers for discrimination last May, said on Tuesday that the firm had fired her. But Kleiner Perkins said she remained an employee.
abstract: Ellen Pao, the venture capitalist who sued Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers for discrimination last May, said on Tuesday that the firm had fired her. But Kleiner Perkins said she remained an employee.

headline.main: At Venture Capital Firm, Arguments About Whether a Partner Is Still Employed
headline.print_headline: At Venture Capital Firm, Arguments About Whether a Partner Is Still Employed
